chatbot.welcome: Welcome to Envogue! I can help you find the perfect product, answer questions about our store, and guide you through your shopping experience. Click on a quick question below or type your own!

greetings.response: Hello! Welcome to Envogue. How can I assist you today?

thanks.response: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

farewell.response: Thank you for chatting with Envogue. Have a great day!

howAreYou.response: I'm doing great, thank you for asking! I'm here to help you with any shopping needs.

productAvailability.response: We have {{totalProducts}} products across {{categories}} categories. Currently, {{inStockProducts}} products are in stock. Would you like to hear about our top categories?

recommendation.available: I recommend our {{productName}} from the {{category}} category. It's priced at Rs {{price}} and available in {{colors}} colors.
recommendation.outOfStock: I'd love to recommend a product, but we're currently low on stock.

payment.response: We offer flexible payment options! Each product has an installment plan. For example, you can pay in 3 installments. The installment price is clearly shown for each product.

order.response: To place an order, simply browse our products, select your desired item, choose a color, and click 'Add to Cart'. Then proceed to checkout and complete your purchase.

shipping.response: We provide tracking for all orders. After purchase, you'll receive a tracking number via email. Typical shipping takes 3-5 business days.

returns.response: We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item in its original condition for a full refund.

support.response: You can reach our customer support via email at support@envogue.com or call our helpline at +1 (555) 123-4567. We're available Monday to Saturday, 9 AM to 6 PM.

discount.response: We occasionally offer seasonal discounts. Sign up for our newsletter to get the latest deals and promotional offers!
